ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and shown him the two highways?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And showed him two highways (of good and evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And did We not show him the two highroads (of good and evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have We not shown him the ways of good and evil?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And did We not guide him to the two elevated things?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And shown him the two ways
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And pointed out to him the two conspicuous ways?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and guided him on the two highways?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And guide him to the parting of the mountain ways?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and shown him the two paths?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And shown Unto him the two highways?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and shown him the two paths [of good and evil]?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And shown him the two highways?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And shown him the two ways (good and evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and guided him on the two paths (of good and evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We showed him the two ways?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And have shown him the two ways?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [90:10] and guided him to the two paths?, [did We not] point out to him the path of good and that of evil?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And guide him to the parting of the mountain ways?) And We showed him the way of goodness and the way of evil; and it is also that this means: the way to the two breasts.
